name: outernetapp
description: ## General - This is starting from a base example Blazor project - We'll be working on making the same project in Node.js - The Node.js project can exist in the same folder structure as the Blazor project - App is mobile optimized - App uses bootstrap 5 - UI is very modern and mobile optimized, And uses black as the primary background color, white text and #b59654 for accent or button colors (with black text when used as a background).
